ygData.subject: Re: Special Thanks to Sylly
ygData.msgSnippet: You are welcome! Just glad I could be of some help.  Well, if you call that help.  The whole thing woulda gone a lot better had we just sat at the
ygData.messageBody:
<blushes> You are welcome!

Just glad I could be of some help. Well, if you call that help. The whole
thing woulda gone a lot better had we just sat at the 'stuck rock' for 15 or
20 minutes and let the little bastiage come to us. But, oh no, I am a bard
and I have tracking! So, off I went, cruising thru HG valley, popping up
tracking, not really looking in front too much when I agro'd a Clops. Hmm,
should be not problem, I'll just run out of his agro range.

So, I took another lap around HG Hill and then I saw you, another clops, a
giant skell and the first clops closing in from behind. So, I ran over to
fear them off, thinking we'd fear and fight them one at a time. Well, when I
got there, I saw you had found Hasten and did not think that you might have
Divine Aura up and not worried about some pesky clops. Hey, it was like 1am
for me and I was not thinking too quick.

Anyways, it was too late and I feared Hasten as well as the clopsi & g-skel.
So, I figgered I'd take the clops for a run while you did business with
Hasten. Hmmm, about 3 bubs of hp later, I realized that little old Hasten
hits pretty good for a gnome! And trained him around the hill a couple
times. Finally, the best plan I could come up with was to train them all to
the Feer zone and let you find them pinned there.

By now you had Atoned the clops and skels and was working on Hasten? The
best laid plans of bards and clerics sometimes (all the time?) go astray.
So, then I figgered I'd just let Hasten kill me right by the stuck rock.
Somehow you took the death but after that everything was non-agro. So,
Grifter hailed Hasten and kept him occupied while you made your way back and
did the bootie quest.

If you want to turn a simple quest into total chaos, gimme a call - I can
pretty much do it every time!

Sylly


----- Original Message -----
From: Miriana <miriana@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, February 16, 2000 2:26 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Special Thanks to Sylly


> From: Miriana <miriana@...>
>
> My cleric got jboots last night. I would like to publicly thank
> Sylly for training cyclops arounded rathe mountains while I did my quest.
> And I know both of us came out of this experience with one gem of
> knowledge:
>
> Screech does indeed affect Hasten Bootstrutter.
>
> That was the most interesting chase I've had in a long time :).
>
> --
> Miriana
> Legions of Darkness
> Innoruuk Server
